department.dept_long_name: Committee on Degrees in Social Studies

course.title: Culture and Politics in the United States
course.description: This course aims to provide a conceptual and methodological toolkit for studying the intersection of "culture," broadly understood, and politics in American society. Key questions to be addressed will include: How can "culture" help us understand American politics? What, if anything, is distinctive about American politics and society? And how does culture shape individual and societal approaches to particular political issues?
